scripts.changelog: cp package.json _package.json &&preset=`conventional-commits-detector` && echo $preset && bump=`conventional-recommended-bump -p angular` && echo ${1:-$bump} && npm --no-git-tag-version version ${1:-$bump} &>/dev/null && conventional-changelog -i CHANGELOG.md -s -p ${2:-$preset} && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json package-lock.json && version=`cat package.json` && git commit -m'docs(CHANGELOG): $version' && mv -f _package.json package.json && npm version ${1:-$bump} -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.push: cd dist && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run docs:build && git subtree push --prefix=_book origin gh-pages
